de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.message.handler.simple

Class DefaultImvHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.message.handler.simple.DefaultImvHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImvHandler, TnccsMessageHandler

    public class DefaultImvHandler
extends Object
implements ImvHandler
    Default IMV handler to handle messages destined to/from an IMV.

      Creates an IMV handler with the given IMV adapter manager to manage the IMV and the given connection factory to create IMV connections for every IMV with the given IMV connection context.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultImvHandler

        public DefaultImvHandler(ImAdapterManager<ImvAdapter> manager,
                 ImvConnectionAdapterFactory connectionFactory,
                 ImvConnectionContext connectionContext,
                 ImMessageRouter router)
        Creates an IMV handler with the given IMV adapter manager to manage the IMV and the given connection factory to create IMV connections for every IMV with the given IMV connection context. The message router is used to route the message based on its component type address to IMV, that are interested in that type.
        Parameters:
        manager - the IMV manager
        connectionFactory - the IMV connection factory
        connectionContext - the IMV connection context
        router - the message router
